docs.name: DIEBOLD INC (NYSE:DBD) - Earnings per Basic Share (Most Recent - Annual)
docs.description:
Indicator Description [Earnings per Basic Share]: The amount of [NETINC] for the period per each [SHARESWA].

Company Self Description [DIEBOLD INC]: The Company is a global leader in providing integrated services and software, financial self-service delivery and security systems to primarily the financial, commercial, retail and other markets.

Dimension: (Most Recent - Annual) - MRY

Statement: Income Statement

Units: currency/share

Sector: Technology

Ticker: DBD

Exchange: NYSE

Index Membership: S&P400, RUSSELL1000

docs.name: Africa: Orphans 0-17 years currently living
docs.description:
AIDS orphans are the estimated number of children who have lost their mother or both parents to AIDS before age 17 since the epidemic began in 1990. Some of the orphaned children included in this cumulative total are no longer alive; others are no longer under age 17.  
Orphans 0-17 years currently living

docs.name: Commodity Imports - Edible Fruit, Nuts, Peel Of Citrus Fruit, Melons / Grapes, fresh - United States of America (after 1980 - incl. VI)
docs.description: The United Nations Commodity Trade Statistics Database (UN Comtrade) stores more than 1 billion trade data records from 1962. Over 140 reporter countries provide the United Nations Statistics Division with their annual international trade statistics detailed by commodities and partner countries. These data are subsequently transformed into the United Nations Statistics Division standard format with consistent coding and valuation using the UN/OECD CoprA internal processing system.

docs.name: Netherlands Hourly Compensation, Current prices, National currency, Main series
docs.description: Netherlands - Hourly Compensation, Current prices, National currency, Neither seasonally nor working day adjusted, Main series , :, Dataset:ESA : ESA95 National Accounts Explanation page (Series and Dataset Level Information), Reference area:Netherlands (NL), Decimals:Two (2), Collection indicator:Summed through period (S), Adjustment detail:Neither seasonally or working day adjusted, Compilation:$EXTEND_BACK(CONVERT($GES_FILTER_NCS_NAS(ESA.Q.NL.N.1000.D10000.0000.TTTT.V.N.A),A,DISC,SUMMED), PCT($GES_FILTER_NCS_NAS(ESA.A.NL.N.1000.D10000.0000.TTTT.V.N.A))) / CONVERT($GES_FILTER_NCS_NAS(ESA.Q.NL.N.1000.EMPLOY.0000.TTTT.N.H.A),A,DISC,AVERAGED) * 1000
